extendedInfo.description: Chicpeoplemeet android app provides mobile access to Chicpeoplemeet.com which is the premiere dating and social and business networking community for those that hold health, fitness and beauty as a priority.  â¢ Search and meet people who are looking to date others who seek a healthy, fit and beautiful lifestyle.â¢ Search and meet professionals in Health, Fitness and Beautyâ¢ Accesses articles and videos related to Health, Fitness and Beauty from some of the worldâs top magazines, newspapers and online resources.The Chicpeoplemeet android app allows members to:â¢ Mobile Chat:  Allows members to send and receive instant messages on the chicpeoplemeet mobile apps from the chicpeoplemeet.com Simple Messenger module.â¢ Manage Mail: sending/receiving site messages (Mailbox)â¢ Manage Profile: joined, information change, rated, viewed, commentedo    friendship requests accepting/decliningo    member profiles and friends browsingâ¢ Manage Photos: added, voted, sharedo    photos upload from device librarieso    photos upload straight from camerao    member photos browsingo    full-screen photos viewer with auto-rotationâ¢ Manage Videos: (local and youtube): added, rated, shared o    member videos browsing and playbackâ¢ Manage Polls: added, replayed, ratedâ¢ Manage Ads:  added, ratedâ¢ Manage Groups: added, changed, rated, joinedâ¢ Manage Events: added, rated, joined, changedâ¢ Manage Sites: added, changed, ratedâ¢ Comment on videos, photos, sites, ads, groups, polls, events postsâ¢ Member music browsing and playbackâ¢ Remembering login info for multiple sitesâ¢ Instant status message updatesâ¢ GPS-based location updatesâ¢ Location-based and keyword-based searchâ¢ Multilingual interface
